item.title: About
item.description: What is marabunta? From its definition, marabunta is one of the names given to army ants. The idea of the project is to create something similar using a client-server topology, thinking about node/client as the ant and the server as the nest. Is a try to apply nature knowledge and patterns into existing networks so on top of the existing tools this could be an option to do extra tasks of simple have a basic communication channel between server/client or the entire network “colony”.
